TopicTitle: Sepratrons ONLY (for propulsion) Attain Orbit, etc.

Articles.Content: As it says. Lets see some posts of who can make it into orbit, or do anything else more extreme, using only sepratrons.
at 4 minutes:

at 4 minutes:

Pretty sweet. Haven't seen this.

Also, he didn't make it into orbit. And if that is not a challenge, try devising some way to orbit the Mun, land, then return to Kerbin just with sepratrons.

Edited November 18, 2014 by Friend Bear

You have not really made a detailed challenge.

I mean, people can understand what you ROUGHLY want to happen, but where are the rules, leaderboards, scoring system, etc.

I'd love to give the challenge a go, by all means.

Cheers,

ToTheMun

Fair enough. But I posted this following the spirit of other challenges. I didn't see anywhere all those details were needed. Just thought it would be fun to have people post attempts/creations for accomplishing anything past orbit with sepratrons.

While it makes sense to have rankings, etc., on other challenges, this one would be harmed completely by something like that.

I'll just request this be taken down. Kind of annoying how its been treated.

In the meantime, I will consider other challenges that fit.

Edited November 18, 2014 by Friend Bear
